name: elm-press
title: Bringing Elm into the Wordpress community the right way.
excerpt: Elm is great and there are so many unexplored use cases. As a member of both communities I want to step up and give a new group of developers a compelling reason and the right tools to bring Elm into their development workflow.
description: Alrighty, so I think the best way I could go about this is to just build build build. Build an audience of people for feedback. Build plugins to get an idea of how all of this looks like in practice. Who knows what else! Follow along here to keep up to date with what is going on:
